Journal.Title: The British journal of psychiatry : the journal of mental science

Article.ArticleTitle: Antidepressant treatment response: 'I want it all, and I want it now!'†.

AbstractText: The treatment of depression remains suboptimal, highlighting the need for more effective antidepressants. Traditional drug discovery and development is time-consuming and costly, prompting the need for faster translation of novel therapies into practice. But clinical expediency comes at a cost against which potential benefits need to be considered judiciously.
